tha-ap159:0.3_0: Held together by grass, clay, with senior monks.
tha-ap159:1.2_0: what has come to be is found
tha-ap159:1.3_0: Vastamī, fearing nothing from any quarter,
tha-ap159:1.4_0: for the world’s level is the throat.
tha-ap159:3.1_0: Even if there is only one eons
tha-ap159:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap159:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable senior venerable junior.
tha-ap159:6.1_0: The seventh part of the senior monks with grass.
